body.p: Accordingly, the Board decided that two line items should be presented, as follows:

li.p: for those repricing time periods for which the hedged item is an asset, the change in its fair value is presented in a single separate line item within assets; and
for those repricing time periods for which the hedged item is a liability, the change in its fair value is presented in a single separate line item within liabilities.
